para.plantuml:
class "Project Main" as pm class "Customer Specification" as cs class "Target Specification" as ts class "System Specification" as sys class "Software Specification" as sws class "Hardware Specification" as hws
pm "1" o-- "1" cs : aggregation pm "1" o-- "1" ts : aggregation cs <|-- ts ts "1" o-- "1" sys : ref > sys "1" <-- "n" sws : refs > sys "1" <-- "n" hws : refs >
